title: [1508521049] Chef Ramsay Teaches Amateur Butchers How to Cook A Perfect Steak - Gordon Ramsay
description:
Gordon returns back to his hometown in Scotland to see if his grandfather’s old butchers shop is still there. He then meets some young, keen butchers and puts their steak knowledge to the test.
From Gordon Ramsay's The F Word

Subscribe for weekly cooking videos. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's channels:

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword
